casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donald Durrant FARROW 341P12-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Donald Durrant Farrow, for Farrow, Donald Durrant. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2018 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Writ of Mandamus: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018." Ervin, J. recused
